fullText:
LLM versioning rules:

1.If performance is mid → don’t bump (e.g. see GPT-4 → 4.5)

2.If < 4 months since last release → don’t bump (e.g. Qwen3-Next)

3.Else → bump (I hear DeepSeek v4 releases in October )
